content: the floriculture cowl is knit seamlessly in the round with addicting stranded colour work this design is perfect for beginners and a great way to use up scraps size 7 5 /19cm tall 10 5 /27cm wide yarn 230 fingering/sport weight yarn 120 yards mc 110 yards cc sample is knit in queensland collection tenderfoot 75% merino 25% polyamide 104 old ivory mc 108 bordeaux red cc *tip if you want a cowl that has a stiff fabric with structure i suggest using a non-superwash wool
